coreValue.title: Core Mission
coreValue.description: Building a permanently trusted global digital genealogy infrastructure

valueProps.title: Core Value Propositions
valueProps.subtitle: A trusted multi-dimensional genealogy layer turning open exploration into confirmed value.

trustedGenealogy.title: Trusted Genealogies
trustedGenealogy.description: Parent references + version coexistence, never overwriting history, only accumulating evidence and consensus

consensusFocus.title: Consensus Formation
consensusFocus.description: Endorsements consume tokens, costs anchored to mining rewards, filtering noise to form factual focus

valuePrecipitation.title: Value Precipitation
valuePrecipitation.description: Version â†’ NFT â†’ holders receive subsequent endorsement fee streams, incentivizing high-quality contributions

narrativeExtension.title: Narrative Extension
narrativeExtension.description: Story shards incremental writing + full hash verification + sealing creates immutable records

privacyGuardian.title: Privacy Protection
privacyGuardian.description: ZK proofs verify structural correctness while hiding original sensitive fields

openComposition.title: Open Composability
openComposition.description: On-chain structure + Subgraph indexing, enabling community to build applications, visualizations, research databases

architecture.title: Dual-Layer Network
architecture.subtitle: Synergistic design of Layer 1 Relational Layer and Layer 2 Value Layer, achieving organic integration of structured data and economic value

layer1.title: Relational Layer
layer1.subtitle: Structure & Temporal Series
layer1.feature1Desc: Hash-based person identification, supporting multi-version coexistence and evolution tracking
layer1.feature2Desc: Immutable version history, each version records creation time and author
layer1.feature3Desc: Building complete genealogy network topology and bloodline relationship chains
layer1.description: Features: Structured data, temporal series, topological networks

layer2.title: Value Layer
layer2.subtitle: Economic Incentives & Assetization
layer2.feature1Desc: Specific versions can be minted as NFTs, carrying value and revenue rights
layer2.feature2Desc: Endorsement fees distributed to NFT holders, creating continuous revenue
layer2.feature3Desc: Versions with complete parent references receive DEEP token rewards
layer2.description: Features: Economic incentives, value discovery, verifiable narrative assetization

advantages.title: Workflow
advantages.step1Desc: If both parents exist â†’ receive mining rewards
advantages.step2Desc: Pay DEEP tokens to endorse a version
advantages.step3Desc: Endorsers can mint NFTs for corresponding versions
advantages.step4Desc: NFT holders write/append person story fragments
advantages.conclusionDesc: Through economic incentive mechanisms, achieving natural accumulation and value discovery of high-quality genealogy data

features.title: Core Features
features.subtitle: Complete feature modules supporting dual-layer network operation

zkVersion.title: ZK Version Addition
zkVersion.description: Submit hash-bound versions with zero-knowledge proofs, verifying structural correctness while hiding sensitive fields

versionManagement.title: Version Management
versionManagement.description: Multi-version coexistence, indexable by name/parents/children, immutable with only additive alternative narratives

endorsementEconomy.title: Endorsement Economy
endorsementEconomy.description: Fees dynamically float with current issuance rewards, endorsements filter priorities, reducing noise to form consensus

personNFT.title: Person NFTs
personNFT.description: Bound to specific versions, carrying value and future revenue rights, incentivizing high-quality data contributions

storySharding.title: Story Sharding
storySharding.description: Shard writing â†’ hash synthesis â†’ sealed as historical snapshots, forming verifiable on-chain archives

versionNotarization.title: Version Notarization
versionNotarization.description: Immutable version history, only additive alternative narratives, with endorsement-filtered priorities

tokenomics.title: Incentives & Token Economics
tokenomics.subtitle: DEEP token-driven sustainable ecosystem incentive mechanism

deepToken.title: DEEP Token
deepToken.description: Multi-stage declining mining â†’ entering stable issuance intervals, anti-inflation design

supply.title: Supply Cap
supply.description: 100 billion token cap, no pre-mining, fair launch

mining.title: Mining Trigger
mining.description: Triggered when adding valid person versions with parent references

endorsement.title: Endorsement Fees
endorsement.description: Equal to current mining rewards, adaptively coupled with issuance intensity

distribution.title: Fee Distribution
distribution.description: Before NFT minting â†’ creators; after NFT minting â†’ NFT holders

goal.title: Economic Goals
goal.description: Encourage high-quality structured completion, suppress spam and repetitive noise

audience.title: Target Audiences
audience.subtitle: A collaborative ecosystem of diverse user groups

contributors.title: Data Contributors
contributors.description: Input, complete and verify genealogy information, building trusted family tree data networks

researchers.title: Family Researchers
researchers.description: Track version evolution and divergences, explore multi-dimensional narratives and truths of family history
researchers.benefit2: Discover hidden connections in family relationship networks

developers.title: Developers
developers.description: Integrate smart contracts, frontend components, develop secondary applications and knowledge graph systems

creators.title: Narrative Creators
creators.description: Write and preserve historical stories, transforming family memories into verifiable on-chain archives
creators.benefit2: Obtain copyright protection through story sharding

contracts.title: Smart Contract Architecture
contracts.subtitle: A complete family tree smart contract system covering person management, endorsement systems, NFT minting, and governance mechanisms

cta.title: Start Building Your Digital Family Tree
cta.subtitle: Build your digital family tree using smart contracts and participate in constructing a decentralized family history recording system
